articles.description: The hospital operator's operational performance improved on year, driven by increased ARPOBs, better patient mix and steady occupancy.
articles.content: Healthcare services provider Max Healthcare Institute on November 6, reported a net profit of Rs 338 crore for the July-September period, up 26 percent from Rs 267 crore clocked in the same quarter o… [+2326 chars]

articles.title: How Many Hours Do Indians Work Every Week? Report Shows Interesting Data - NDTV
articles.description: A 2018 International Labour Organisation (ILO) report says that only Qatar, Congo, Lesotho, Bhutan, Gambia, and the United Arab Emirates have higher average working hours than India.
articles.content:
In contrast, France has the shortest work-week among top economies.
New Delhi: With an average of 47.7 working hours every week, Indians are seventh on the list of countries that work the most globa… [+4366 chars]
